Dragon Talk - An Official Dungeons & Dragons Podcast Go inside the walls of Dungeons & Dragons for exclusive interviews and previews! The D&D team sits down each week with celebrities and personalities from across gaming and pop culture to discuss one of the greatest fantasy brands of all-time. We'll talk about the tabletop roleplaying game, as the latest in D&D video games, comics, novels, movies, and television, plus listen to our live play-throughs featuring Penny-Arcade's Acquisitions Incorporated. en-us Go inside the walls of Dungeons & Dragons for exclusive interviews and previews! The D&D team sits down each week with celebrities and personalities from across gaming and pop culture to discuss one of the greatest fantasy brands of all-time. We'll talk about the tabletop roleplaying game, as the latest in D&D video games, comics, novels, movies, and television, plus listen to our live play-throughs featuring Penny-Arcade's Acquisitions Incorporated. http://dnd.wizards.com/
Copyright 2017 Wizards of the Coast greg.tito@wizards.com The Official Dungeons & Dragons Podcast.
Greg Tito greg.tito@wizards.com
Dungeons & Dragons, tabletop games, video games, interviews, play, D&D, celebrities, Acquisition Inc, Acquisitions Incorporated, fantasy

Games
dnd@wizards.com (Greg Tito)
Nathan Stewart on Filming Force Grey Dungeons & Dragons Force Grey: Lost City of Omu adds Joe Manganiello and Deborah Ann Woll to the cast and Nathan Stewart (@nathanbstewart) and Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) share what it was like being in the room with all that crazy talent. Watch Force Grey: Lost City of Omu on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 5pm PT, and catch up on the old episodes in the collection here. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) discuss who Volo (of Volo’s Guide to Monsters fame) is and where he came from. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
Here’s a guide to when each segment on the podcast begins: 00:00 – Intro with Greg Tito (@gregtito), Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) + Nathan & Bart! 19:28 – Lore You Should Know – Volothamp Geddarn 35:55 – Interview with Nathan Stewart (@nathanbstewart) and Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) ~01:10:30 – Outro with Greg, Shelly, Bart and Nathan
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_08_24_2017.mp3 Thu, 24 Aug 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:14:44
Holly Conrad on Dice Camera Action Dungeons & Dragons Holly Conrad (@hollyconrad) is an amazing roleplayer and costume designer, and D&D fans know her from playing the Tiefling “trash-witch” Strix in Dice Camera Action with Chris Perkins. Hosts Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll), filling in for Shelly, and Greg Tito (@gregtito) ask Holly about Strix, her birds, and her love of Planescape. We also strongly hint at her appearance with the Acquisitions Inc. crew at PAX West. Lore You Should Know – Chris Perkins (@ChrisPerkinsDND) and Matt Sernett (@Sernett) discuss the nation of Halrua. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
Here’s a guide to when each segment on the podcast begins: 00:00 – Intro with Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) 06:39 – Lore You Should Know – Halrua 27:35 – Interview with Holly Conrad (@hollyconrad) 01:15:33 – Outro with Greg and Bart
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_08_17_17.mp3 Thu, 17 Aug 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:21:09
ProJared on Dice Camera Action Dungeons & Dragons You may have been watching Jared Knabenbauer (@ProJared) on his YouTube channel, but many fans of D&D know him as the rogue, Diath, in Dice Camera Action with Chris Perkins. Hosts Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll), filling in for Shelly, and Greg Tito (@gregtito) ask him all about his favorite character and how he got started with D&D. Lore You Should Know – Chris Perkins (@ChrisPerkinsDND) and Matt Sernett (@Sernett) delve into the history of the lich Valindra Shadowmantle, a villain featured in Neverwinter. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
Here’s a guide to when each segment on the podcast begins: 00:00 – Intro with Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) 04:56 – Lore You Should Know – Valindra Shadowmantle 19:48 – Interview with Jared Knabenbauer (@ProJared) 01:14:01 – Outro with Greg and Bart
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_08_10_17.mp3 Thu, 10 Aug 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:16:46
Dan Telfer on Nerd Poker Dungeons & Dragons Comedian Dan Telfer (@dantelfer) calls in to talk about his stint as Dungeon Master on Brian Posehn’s Nerd Poker D&D live play podcast. Hosts Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) get into some very interesting territory with Dan such as suicide, cancer and using D&D to cope. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_08_03_17.mp3 Thu, 03 Aug 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:29:47
Deborah Ann Woll on Force Grey: Lost City of Omu Dungeons & Dragons The amazing actress Deborah Ann Woll, who you may know from her roles on Daredevil and True Blood, calls in to speak about her love of D&D and what it was like to play with Joe Manganiello and the rest of the Force Grey cast for the new season premiering on twitch.tv/dnd at 5pm PT on July 31st. Hosts Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) chat about board game projects you don’t even know about. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_07_27_17.mp3 Thu, 27 Jul 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:20:02
Anna Prosser Robinson on Dice Camera Action Dungeons & Dragons Roleplayer, Twitch host, and cofounder of Misscliks, Anna Prosser Robinson (@annaprosser) comes on the show to discuss her character Evelyn, women wrestling shows, and what it’s like playing with Chris Perkins on Dice Camera Action each Tues. on twitch.tv/dnd at 4pm PT. Hosts Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) go a bit crazy. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_07_20_17.mp3 Thu, 20 Jul 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:26:59
Aram Vartian of Godsfall Dungeons & Dragons Aram Vartian (@vartian) calls in to chat about his actual play podcast, and forthcoming world book, for Godsfall. Lore You Should Know – Chris Perkins and Matthew Sernett talk about Port Nyanzaru/Tomb of Annihilation. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_07_13_2017.mp3 Thu, 13 Jul 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:15:52
Quinn Murphy on D&D Stories Dungeons & Dragons Game designer Quinn Murphy (@qhmurphy) calls in to chat about his time in fourth edition and how you can apply some of that to playing fifth. Hosts Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) talk about Shelly’s time at Origins Game Fair. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT! Sage Advice – Jeremy Crawford talks about magic items in D&D fifth edition.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_07_06_2017.mp3 Thu, 6 Jul 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:24:55
Stan! Brown on TSR Old Days Dungeons & Dragons Over the course of his career Stan Brown (@stannex) has worn a lot of creative hats, but he now serves as a producer for the tabletop RPG at D&D. Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) fills in as host for Shelly Mazzanoble while she recovers from Origins Game Fair. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT! Sage Advice – Jeremy Crawford (@jeremyecrawford) speaks about the philosophy of rules and rulings in D&D fifth edition.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_06_29_2017.mp3 Thu, 29 Jun 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:40:43
Wolfgang Baur on Tome of Beasts 2: Electric Beastaloo Dungeons & Dragons Mr. Wolfgang Baur (@MonkeyKing) drops by the office after picking up a new shipment of Tome of Beasts to talk about what Kobold Press (@KoboldPress) is doing next. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT! Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@sernett) and Chris Perkins (@chrisperkinsdnd) talk about dinosaurs in D&D and dinosaur-like peoples.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_06_22_2017.mp3 Thu, 22 Jun 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:18:29
Suzanne Wallace on Roll20 Dungeons & Dragons Suzanne Wallace (@iamasnarkypants) is the Brand Manager of Roll20, an online tabletop platform you can use to play D&D adventures, and she stops by to talk about the Stream of Annihilation, Curse of Strahd coming to Roll20 and Danielle Steele novels. Watch Dragon Talk recordings live on twitch.tv/dnd Mondays at 2pm PT! Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins talk about the history of the bird-like people called aarakocra.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_06_15_2017.mp3 Thu, 15 Jun 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:17:27
Girls, Guts, Glory on Stream of Annihilation Dungeons & Dragons Watch the Stream of Annihilation on June 2&3 at 10am PT on twitch.tv/dnd with streamed D&D games with all kinds of amazing people, including our guests from Girls, Guts, Glory, Kim Hidalgo and Erika Fermina. Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) explore the wonders of audio editing. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins don’t hold back in discussing Ubtao and Mezro.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_06_01_2017.mp3 Thu, 1 Jun 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:02:09
HighRollers on Stream of Annihilation Dungeons & Dragons Watch the Stream of Annihilation on June 2&3 at 10am PT on twitch.tv/dnd with streamed D&D games with all kinds of amazing people, including our guests from HighRollers, Chris Trott, Mark Hulmes and Katie Morrison. Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) attempt to be funny. Lore You Should Know –Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins go into what’s around the planet of Abeir-Toril in the Forgotten Realms.
Here’s a guide to when each segment on the podcast begins:
00:00 – Intro with Greg Tito and Shelly Mazzanoble
06:05 – Lore You Should Know – Cosmos of Forgotten Realms
31:10 – Interview with Mark Hulmes, Katie Morrison and Chris Trott from Yogcast’s HighRollers
01:10:20 – Outro with Greg and Shelly

Dragon Friends on Stream of Annihilation Dungeons & Dragons Watch the Stream of Annihilation on June 2&3 at 10am PT on twitch.tv/dnd with streamed D&D games with all kinds of amazing people, including our guests from the Dragon Friends, Benny Davis (@bennymofodavis) and Edan Lacey. Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) find out from the Australians what makes their game special. Lore You Should Know –Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins discuss Baldur’s Gate.

05:00 – Lore You Should Know – Baldur’s Gate

01:19:40 – Outro with Greg and Shelly
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_05_25_2017.mp3 Thu, 25 May 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:12:34
Satine Phoenix and Ruty Rutenberg Stream of Annihilation Dungeons & Dragons Watch the Stream of Annihilation on June 2&3 at 10am PT on twitch.tv/dnd with streamed D&D games from our guests Satine Phoenix (@satinephoenix) and Ruty Rutenberg (@rutywoot) and some of their Maze Arcana group from L.A. Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) interview the interviewers on getting info on the new D&D storyline, and all the awesome groups playing D&D on the Stream of Annihilation. Lore You Should Know – Loremaster Matt Sernett talk about the progenitor races of the Forgotten Realms.

34:18 – Interview with Satine Phoenix and Ruty Rutenberg from Maze Arcana!
01:12:00 – Outro with Greg and Shelly

Anna Prosser Robinson and Kelly Link on Hosting Stream of Annihilation Dungeons & Dragons Watch the Stream of Annihilation on June 2&3 at 10am PT on twitch.tv/dnd hosted by the amazing Anna Prosser Robinson (@annaprosser) and Kelly Link (@hellokellylink). Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) interview the interviewers on getting info on the new D&D storyline, and all the awesome groups playing D&D on the Stream of Annihilation. Lore You Should Know – Loremaster Matt Sernett talk about the progenitor races of the Forgotten Realms.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_05_11_2017.mp3 Thu, 11 May 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:16:57
Adam Bradford & Leah Koons on D&D Beyond Dungeons & Dragons Strap in, this is a LONG episode. Our new friends from Curse Media call in to chat about the digital tools coming this summer in D&D Beyond. Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) reassert their love of voice-acting C-3PO. Sage Advice – Jeremy Crawford goes into all the thinking and potential pitfalls behind multi-classing in D&D fifth edition.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_05_04_2017.mp3 Thu, 4 May 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 02:00:47
James Haeck on D&D Writing Dungeons & Dragons Breaking into freelance D&D writing is tough, but James Haeck (@jamesjhaeck) joins us to tell us how his talents were discovered with a little help from a Critical Role. Greg Tito (@gregtito) is joined by co-host Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) to chat about superheroes and kids puking. Sage Advice – Jeremy Crawford speaks about stealth, but you need to roll Wisdom (Perception) check to determine if you can hear him.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_04_27_2017.mp3 Thu, 27 Apr 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:35:16
Emi Tanji and Kate Irwin on Art Design in TftYP Dungeons & Dragons Senior Graphic Designer Emi Tanji and Art Director Kate Irwin come to the studio to talk about putting together Tales from the Yawning Portal, a much different book than the D&D team has made in the past. Hosts Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) talk briefly about headphones, which are called “cans” in the audio business, I swear. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) and Chris Perkins (@ChrisPerkinsDND) talk about the funny, wondrous creatures called Flumphs.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_04_20_2017.mp3 Thu, 20 Apr 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:05:37
Mike Mearls on Tales from the Yawning Portal Dungeons & Dragons Mike Mearls (@mikemearls) stops by the podcast to chat about the latest book from D&D, Tales from the Yawning Portal. Hosts Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) talk about old-school cosplay and evil horses named Fury. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) goes into the story behind two deities in D&D - Lathander and Amauntaur. Thanks to @jimdabison for the topic suggestion!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_04_13_2017.mp3 Thu, 13 Apr 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:20:23
Chris Avellone and Philip Daigle on Planescape: Torment Enhanced Edition Dungeons & Dragons The writer of Planescape: Torment, Mr. Chris Avellone, and Philip Daigle from Beamdog join us to talk about what's updated for the Enhanced Edition and the legacy of the 1999 classic. Hosts Trevor Kidd (@the_trevor_kidd) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) struggle through Greg's sickness to keep the energy up! Sage Advice - Jeremy Crawford (@JeremyECrawford) discusses at length the complexities of the Druid class feature Wild Shape.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_04_06_2017.mp3 Thu, 06 Apr 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:23:00
Justin Ziran and Kate Irwin on WizKids Miniatures Dungeons & Dragons A major part of the fun of D&D is seeing the miniatures on the table and Justin Ziran, head of WizKids, works with D&D art director Kate Irwin to make them memorable for fans. Hosts Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) try not to talk about The Bachelor. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) explores the area of Chult in the Forgotten Realms. Thanks to @VeritableTwenty for the topic suggestion!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_03_30_2017.mp3 Thu, 30 Mar 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:25:29
Dylan Sprouse on PUG Crawl Dungeons & Dragons Dylan Sprouse (@dylansprouse) has been playing D&D since he was on set as a child actor and he’s jumped into it full force with his Pug Crawl streams on Twitch. Hosts Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) talk about snow again, before Greg gets the date of Meltdown Shopping Network debut on Mar 24 consistently wrong in this recording – sorry Gaston! Check it out on Twitch.tv/wotc_dnd Mar. 24 starting at 4pm PT! Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) talks about the multitude of entities in D&D lore from which a warlock can draw power. Thanks to @monkib0y for the topic suggestion!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_03_23_2017.mp3 Thu, 23 Mar 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:06:31
Experiment 7 on Dungeon Chess Dungeons & Dragons Geoffrey Zatkin (@geoffreyzatkin) and Demetri Detsaridis (@detsaridis) from Experiment 7 call in from GDC to unload their D&D-cred on us and the possibilities of VR starting with Dungeon Chess! Hosts Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito) do some time-traveling talk of snow. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) talks about the fun of the Moonshae Isles, an archipelago full of interesting and sometimes contrasting cultures. Thanks to @VeritableTwenty for the topic suggestion!
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_03_16_2017.mp3 Thu, 16 Mar 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:15:15
Jerry Holkins on Acquisitions Inc. C Team Dungeons & Dragons Jerry Holkins from Penny Arcade calls in to speak effusively about his Acquisitions Inc. C Team stream, what he’s doing during PAX East, and blacking out on stage with a loopy Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo) and Greg Tito (@gregtito). Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) goes into depth on White Plume Mountain, one of the adventures from Tales from the Yawning Portal.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_03_09_2017.mp3 Thu, 09 Mar 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:18:24
John Darnielle from the Mountain Goats on Storytelling Dungeons & Dragons
Bart Carroll (@bart_carroll) and Trevor Kidd (@the_trevor_kidd) take over hosting duties as John Darnielle, leader of the folk-rock group The Mountain Goats (@mountain_goats), dropped by the office to chat about his new novel Universal Harvester, his music and how D&D is a throughline. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) speaks with missing host Greg Tito on the Hidden Shrine of Tamoachan.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_03_02_2017.mp3 Thu, 02 Mar 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 00:55:57
Thomas Foss on Neverwinter: The Cloaked Ascendancy Dungeons & Dragons
The veteran game designer from Cryptic Studios, Thomas Foss, rejoins the podcast to discuss the next module coming to Neverwinter based on four mages returning to the city. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) and Chris Perkins (@ChrisPerkinsDND) go into the first series of adventure modules published by TSR, collectively called Against the Giants.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_02_23_2017.mp3 Thu, 23 Feb 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 00:56:28
Tanya DePass on Creating D&D Characters Dungeons & Dragons Tanya DePass (@cypheroftyr) has played D&D for years and she brings her experience in talking about diversity in gaming to creating D&D characters and her shared love of Dragon Age 2 with Greg Tito. Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett (@Sernett) and Chris Perkins (@ChrisPerkinsDND) discuss the iconic Tomb of Horrors adventure in Tales from the Yawning Portal. Plus, guest host Bart Carroll joins the podcast to talk about Dragon+.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_02_16_2017.mp3 Thu, 16 Feb 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:16:32
Joe Manganiello on Acting D&D Dungeons & Dragons You may know Joe Manganiello (@JoeManganiello) from True Blood and the Magic Mike films, and he’ll be playing Deathstroke in the next Batman movie. In talking to Greg Tito (@gregtito) and Shelly Mazzanoble (@shellymoo), Joe geeks out about all things D&D, fantasy, and comics. Sage Advice – Jeremy Crawford (@JeremyECrawford) goes over reaction timing in initiative order.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_02_09_2017.mp3 Thu, 09 Feb 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:22:11
Matt Colville on How to DM Dungeons & Dragons Video game and fantasy writer Matt Colville (@mattcolville) talks with us about getting into Dungeon Mastering, which he expounds upon in his YouTube videos. Sage Advice – Jeremy Crawford (@JeremyECrawford) discusses temporary hit points and some the design and confusion about it.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_02_02_2017.mp3 Thu, 02 Feb 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:36:43
Adam Koebel and JP McDaniel on Streaming D&D Dungeons & Dragons Two early adopters of streaming live D&D play online, J.P. McDaniel (@itmejp) and Adam Koebel (@skinnyghost) call in to chat with us about their inspiration. In Lore You Should Know, Chris Perkins and Matt Sernett go into detail on the recent happenings in the Forgotten Realms.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_01_26_2017.mp3 Thu, 26 Jan 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:26:17
Wolfgang Baur on DMing for Girl Scouts Dungeons & Dragons Kobold in Chief Wolfgang Baur visits the show to check in with us, talk about his recent DMing for Girl Scouts and what’s coming down the pipe in 2017 for Kobold Press. In Sage Advice, Jeremy Crawford wades into the mire of spell targeting and clears away the muck to provide clarity.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_01_19_2017.mp3 Thu, 19 Jan 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:30:40
Luke Gygax on GaryCon Dungeons & Dragons The son of D&D co-creator Gary Gygax calls in to talk with about his father’s legacy and the upcoming GaryCon he runs in Lake Geneva, Wisconsin. In Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins talk more about Blackstaff and what that means in the Forgotten Realms.
http://media.wizards.com/2017/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_01_12_2017.mp3 Thu, 12 Jan 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:32:59
Monica Valentinelli on D&D Adventures Dungeons & Dragons Shelly Mazzanoble and Greg Tito speak to Monica Valentinelli, a prolific creative writer with heavy involvement in all forms of D&D from adventure writing to running and playing games with new players. In Lore You Should Know – Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins jump into the Yawning Portal.
http://media.wizards.com/2016/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_01_05_2017.mp3 Thu, 05 Jan 2017 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:25:19
Jeff Greiner on The Tome Show Dungeons & Dragons Shelly Mazzanoble and Greg Tito talk with an old friend of Dragon Talk, Mr. Jeff Greiner from second longest running D&D podcast: The Tome Show! In Lore You Should Know, Chris Perkins and Matt Sernett go over holidays and the calendar in the Forgotten Realms. Happy Holidays! We’re taking a few weeks off but Dragon Talk will return in 2017!
http://media.wizards.com/2016/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_12_22_2016.mp3 Thu, 22 Dec 2016 09:30:00 PDT Games no 01:18:42
David Eddings on Roleplaying Claptrap Dungeons & Dragons Special guest David Eddings from Gearbox Software calls in and talks (a lot) about how he got way into D&D late in life, how he recorded the voice of an iconic character from Borderlands, and how he spoke about his cousin the fantasy author with George R. R. Martin. Before that, Lore You Should Know jumps into a pivotal moment in the Forgotten Realms with Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins – the Sundering!
http://media.wizards.com/2016/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_12_15_2016.mp3 Thu, 15 Dec 2016 06:00:00 PDT Games no 00:53:21
Reid and Kelsey on Sneak Attack podcast Dungeons & Dragons We hear from some of the folks (DM Reid and Kelsey who plays Brenna) behind the awesome Sneak Attack Podcast, a live play but slightly edited D&D audio adventure. The return of Lore You Should Know! – Matt Sernett and Chris Perkins join Greg Tito to discuss the positive and negative planes in D&D cosmology.
http://media.wizards.com/2016/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_12_08_2016.mp3 Thu, 08 Dec 2016 06:00:00 PDT Games no 01:20:41
David Reid on MetaArcade Dungeons & Dragons D&D is all about creativity and David Reid from MetaArcade (@pokethulhu) talks about a product he's bringing to mobile and PC to help burgeoning D&D players write their own simple adventures for their friends to enjoy. Sage Advice - Jeremy Crawford (@jeremyecrawford) sheds some light on how the Lucky feat interacts with advantage and disadvantage rolls.
http://media.wizards.com/2016/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_12_01_2016.mp3 Thu, 01 Dec 2016 06:00:00 PDT Games no 01:08:10
Jon Peterson on the Lost D&D Radio Show Dungeons & Dragons On this special Thanksgiving Day episode, we are proud to present a previously unknown part of D&D history – a pilot for a D&D radio show created in 1982 by TSR. Archivist Jon Peterson uncovered this recording and allowed us to present it in full, with plenty of commentary from Greg Tito and Shelly Mazzanoble.
http://media.wizards.com/2016/podcasts/dnd/DnDPodcast_11_23_2016.mp3 Thu, 24 Nov 2016 06:00:00 PDT Games no 01:28:42
Satine Phoenix and Ruty Rutenberg on Maze Arcana Dungeons & Dragons Our friends from L.A., Satine Phoenix and Ruty Rutenberg call in to talk about starting a D&D live stream, playing Eberron in fifth edition and where to get good elf ears, not necessarily in order. We also introduce a new segment called Sage Advice with Jeremy Crawford, lead rules developer for D&D, to clarify rules that affect Armor Class like barkskin and cover.
